tachyon.master.file.meta

Class FileSystemMasterView

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.file.meta.FileSystemMasterView

  • public final class FileSystemMasterView
extends Object
    This class exposes a read-only view of FileSystemMaster. This class is thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSystemMasterView(FileSystemMaster fileSystemMaster)
      Constructs a view of the FileSystemMaster.

        Returns:
